```{r}
library(sf)
library(sfnetworks)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
Indy_Streets <- st_read("https://opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/fa9ec663cf25407a9b7645ff14334a7f_13.geojson") %>%
    st_cast("LINESTRING") %>%
    as_sfnetwork()
```
